markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Retributive Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=5) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 107 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger** An enemy damages your ally, and both are within 15 feet of you.

</column>

---

You protect your ally and strike your foe. The ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level. If the foe is within reach, make a melee Strike against it.
name: Retributive Strike
